law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 487, sec. 27, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 259, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 336, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2031a-5, 2031a-6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Accounting and settlement by guardian for income from lease -- Assignment of one-half of income from lease to surviving spouse where dower and curtesy is outstanding in mineral rights -- Descent of leasehold estate.
